newsitem.title: USA: Dow jumps, then fades as blue chips turn choppy.
newsitem.headline: Dow jumps, then fades as blue chips turn choppy.

text.p: U.S. blue chips bounced higher in late afternoon on Tuesday, triggering program trading curbs on the New York Stock Exchange for a second time today.
Within minutes, however, the Dow settled back to the moderately higher levels it had maintained for most of the afternoon. With just minutes to go in the session, the Dow stood at 7328, up 38 points.
The NYSE reimposed index-arbitrage curbs at 1535 EDT/1935 GMT when the Dow's late rally pushed its gains past the 50-point mark.
